meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of a sulfide of cobalt and arsenic.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a shiny cobaltite in the mine.
meanings.sent2: Miners extracted cobaltite to obtain cobalt for industrial use.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gnome used cobaltite as a doorstop in his tiny house.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like cobaltite in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The cobaltite glowed with a mysterious blue light, captivating all who saw it.

meanings.sent1: The factory relied on cobaltite for their production of batteries.
meanings.sent2: The scientist discovered a new cobaltite deposit in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly used cobaltite instead of salt in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as rare and precious as cobaltite.
meanings.sent5: The cobaltite vein promised a rich harvest of valuable cobalt.
